title: Descent into the Rift
goal: Stop the ritual and save Vane's soul (or end it).
stakes_shift: The fate of the entire galaxy hangs in the balance.

scenes.summary: Kaelen enters Vane's mind through their shared blood-bond.
scenes.outcome: He sees the source of Vane's madness—the fear of the 'Great Silence'.

scenes.summary: Lyra begins the counter-resonance, her body glowing with white heat.
To fully break the ritual, someone must stay within the Rift to seal it from the inside.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen prepares to stay, but Astra offers herself instead.

scenes.summary: Vane realizes the error of his ways as the void-energy turns on him.
scenes.outcome: Vane begs Kaelen to end his life before he becomes a monster.

scenes.summary: Kaelen delivers a mercy kill to his brother.
scenes.outcome: Vane is dead; the primary threat is neutralized but the Rift is still open.

scenes.summary: Astra merges with the Rift, turning the black hole into a new, stable star.
scenes.outcome: The galaxy is saved, but Astra is gone.

scenes.summary: The shockwave throws Kaelen and Lyra back toward the surface.
scenes.outcome: They are safe, but the world is changed.
